description: NoopQuotasDriver.get_settable_quotas() tries to call update() on non-existing dictionary entry. While NoopQuotasDriver is not really useful, we still want it to be working.
title: NoopQuotasDriver.get_settable_quotas() method always fail with KeyError

comments.content: NoopQuotasDriver.get_settable_quotas() tries to call update() on non-existing dictionary entry. While NoopQuotasDriver is not really useful, we still want it to be working.

    Fix NoopQuotasDriver.get_settable_quotas()
    
    get_settable_quotas() always failed with KeyError. While this driver
    is not really useful, we still want it to be working.
